attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP!!!!
attributes.review: I got this app in hopes to see more of my beautiful orange president but as Soon as it had finished downloading I went into the app and it immediately showed me my own address and then five minutes later a van pulled up to my house and then BROKE INTO MY HOUSE!!! They then took me on a trip that lasted two days and then After I was at the White House they then took me inside where I saw the ugliest man ever it was the so called president of the United States like when I saw him in the media I knew he was ugly, but then I saw him in real life and it was like looking at a cockroach he then told me that I was ugly because I wasn’t a white woman and then he put a mask on me that looked like the face of his daughter ivanka trump and then took me to a room and then said he was about to RAPE ME!! After he said that I ran into the bathroom and locked the door he was banging on it but then I ripped this pole thing from the shower and I told him if he would back up I would come out I then came out and beat him with it and I managed to escape while he was unconscious I am now in the safety of my new home and I am now URGING YOU GUYS TO PLEASE NOT GET THIS APP FOR YOUR OWN SAFETY i am going to be suing but if you don’t hear from me that means that something has happened please know that HE IS THE ULTIMATE ENEMY AND WE MUST FIGHT BACK we can not let this go again for another four years he is the worst and even supporting this app is mildly terrifying please don’t let this go unheard of AND IF YOU THINK THAT FOR ONE SECOND THAT HIS INTENTIONS WHERE TO “ MaKe aMeRiCa GrEaT AgAiN” THEN YOU ARE LYING TO YOURSELF please I beg of you help me fight back that is the corruption of president trump and his allies:(((!!!!!!

attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️ABSOLUTELY DONT RECOMMEND🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: it took five ever to download. when it finally downloaded i noticed that trump is trying to ban tiktok ?? excuse me, mr.cheeto dust. what else am i gonna do ? i go there when i’m sad, happy, bored, at a party. like ???? you can’t take away my life necessity. i will literally crumple up into a raisin lookin thing and die. i have no other form of entertainment other than beating up my siblings and i’m trying to break that habit 😞✋🏼.  moral of the story ... no✨

attributes.title: No 👎👎
attributes.review:
It took 46w to download and when it did it glitches out and started play the chicken wing song and wouldn’t stop😾😾😾 even if I closed out my apps 🤯 even if restarted my phone😤 then eventually I got so heated that I threw my phone and broke my cats left buttock which cause me $7828267 at the vet and they didn’t even fix my problem so now I have no phone 📱 or cat 🐈 (rip mr.fluffybuttock😢)btw I’m tying this on my Samsung mini fridge,
Over all do not recommend

attributes.title: Freaking helllll
attributes.review: This is absolutely the worst app ever. I downloaded last Wednesday it’s Thursday😕. It’s absolutely terrible the app doesn’t even run. Also as soon as I downloaded my turtle said f u then he ran away and he f*cking ate my cat tail first. My refrigerator stopped running now he’s in a resting state. Besides all the other problems. Imagine being against everybody (Women, Immigrants, POC, LGBTQIA, Muslim, etc). My pillowcase won’t even go on my pillow anymore since I downloaded this app. I woke up bald today because of this app 😑. I just can’t how does an “app” cause so many problems for the country. This “app” is very hypocritical and is against what America should be about. Equal rights ha don’t know her. This “app” can’t run a country.

attributes.title: how dare you
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app i was expecting to learn more about what trump was doing for this country but instead all i found were pages upon pages of racism and white supremacist propaganda. while scrolling, appalled, my phone began to burn hot and emitting a green laser pointed directly at my forehead. it kept repeating “vote for trump or die” I DIDNT EVEN KNOW IPHONES CAME WITH GUNS INSIDE, NO DOUBT TRUMPS DOING. obviously as a democrat i refused to say i’ll vote for trump.before i knew it my phone was so  hot i couldn’t even hold it! i dropped it and it burned a hole in my carpet! i left it and after a while, when i cooled off, i came to find out ALL OF MY DATA HAD BEEN WIPED FROM MY PHONE. how DARE you donald trump, use fear mongering to earn more votes. disgusting.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET😾
attributes.review: I downloaded the app hoping too see my wonderful orange racist Cheeto president 🙈🙈💕and I wanted updates but as soon as it download which the download took 3 months🤬 but right when I opened the app I got a call from the orange man himself telling me to vote or else😿 I got shy and hung up🙈I forgot to vote so the next day 10 Oompa-Loompas BROKE INTO MY HOUSE 🙀🙀 They were kinda cute 😼 BUT THEY KILLED MY FAMILY 😿😿 And told me to vote this experience was absolutely horrible 😾 also I am now homeless 😫😫but gladly mr clean took me in☺️🌸also the app completely glitched my phone 😾🤬🤬okay bye now ima go have dinner w mr clean 🧽😩✨💕💕🦄🌸🍭🧚‍♀️

This app took 1 year to. Download hacked all of my. Social medias and data and said if you want to back vote trump 2000000000090 soo I wish I could put 1 Star but to top it off it said TikTok was getting banned no matter what.... BUT GEN Z DOES NOT GO DOWN WITH OUT A FIGHT
